articles.content:

articles.title: Nvidia stock tumbles 9% to lowest level since mid-August - Yahoo Finance
articles.description: Nvidia stock tanked more than 9% on Tuesday as tech led the market losses.
articles.content:
Nvidia (NVDA) shares sank more than 9% on Tuesday to close at $108 each as the overall market declined on the first trading day of the month.

articles.title: RIP LCD: Apple Reportedly Goes All-OLED for New iPhones - CNET
articles.description: iPhones across the board will include OLED technology, not just the pricier models, according to a Japanese newspaper report.
articles.content: Apple is saying goodbye to LCD-based displays across its lower-priced iPhone models, completing its transition to OLED-based screens for all iPhones, according to a report from the Japanese newspaper… [+1018 chars]
